 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצֵר‎</span>], I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַר‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:44c»§ 44c</sup> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 384, 2</sup>) **verb** ==be short== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצֵר‎</span> ***short***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִצֵּר‎</span> ***shorten***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shorten***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be short***, with <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***come short of***; Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְצַר‎</span> be short); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַר‎</span> [[Isa.28.20|Isa 28:20]]; [[Mic.2.7|Mic 2:7]] ([[BDB#SS|SS]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְצַר‎</span> from adjective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצֵר‎</span>); 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽצְרָה‎</span> [[Isa.50.2|Isa 50:2]]; [[Isa.59.1|Isa 59:1]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקְצַר‎</span> [[Job.21.4|Job 21:4]] +, 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקְצֹרְנָה‎</span> [[Prov.10.27|Prov 10:27]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצוֺר‎</span> [[Isa.50.2|Isa 50:2]] ***Passive participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְצֻרוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.42.5|Ezek 42:5]] — ***be short***, of bed [[Isa.28.20|Isa 28:20]] (figurative), of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשָׁכוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.42.5|Ezek 42:5]] especially (figurative) of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַד י‎</span>, i.e. be ineffective, powerless [[Num.11.23|Num 11:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare [[Isa.50.2|Isa 50:2]] (+ infinitive absolute), [[Isa.59.1|Isa 59:1]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶפֶשׁ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ‎</span>, = ***be impatient*** (opposed to [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָרַח‎</span>] **Hiph\`il 1** (c)): <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ הָעָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִתִּק‎</span> [[Num.21.4|Num 21:4]]b ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), of utter discouragement, compare (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ‎</span>) [[Job.21.4|Job 21:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשׁוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּק‎</span> [[Judg.16.16|Judg 16:16]] i.e. he was worn out (by importunity), so of prophets (representing <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Zech.11.8|Zech 11:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person) reach limit of patience with, endurance of; of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Judg.10.16|Judg 10:16]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of thing); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Mic.2.7|Mic 2:7]] (see above); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> of time [[Prov.10.27|Prov 10:27]] (years of wicked). **Pi\`el** ***shorten Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִצַּר יָמַי‎</span> [[Ps.102.24|Ps 102:24]]. **Hiph\`il** ***id., Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְצַרְתָּ יְמֵי וגו‎</span> [[Ps.89.46|Ps 89:46]]. 



<small>Also see: **<big>[[H7105|קָצִיר]]</big>**</small>

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַר‎</span>] **verb** ==reap, harvest== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצִיר‎</span> ***harvest***; compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡aƒâru***</u></abbr> ***join together, collect***; see [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pr 166 f.</sup> [[BDB#Zehnpf|Zehnpf]]<sup>BAS i. 503</sup> (not Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: [<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">] ***constringere***, see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl (1886), 735</sup>)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצָ֑רוּ‎</span> [[Jer.12.13|Jer 12:13]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְצוֺר‎</span> [[Isa.17.5|Isa 17:5]]; [[Eccl.11.4|Eccl 11:4]] + [[Prov.22.8|Prov 22:8]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְצָרֿ‎</span>); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְצֹרוּן‎</span> [[Ruth.2.9|Ruth 2:9]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִצְרוּ‎</span> [[Hos.10.12|Hos 10:12]] +; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְצֹר‎</span> [[1Sam.8.12|1Sam 8:12]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֻצְרֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Lev.23.22|Lev 23:22]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֻצְרְכֶם‎</span> [[Lev.19.9|Lev 19:9]]; [[Lev.23.22|Lev 23:22]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺצֵר‎</span> [[Jer.9.21|Jer 9:21]] +, etc.: — ***reap***, with accusative of crop: accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצִיר‎</span> [[1Sam.6.13|1Sam 6:13]]; [[1Sam.8.12|1Sam 8:12]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרִשׁ‎</span>), [[Lev.19.9|Lev 19:9]]; [[Lev.23.10|Lev 23:10]]; [[Lev.23.22|Lev 23:22]] (all [[BDB#H|H]]) [[Deut.24.19|Deut 24:19]] accusative of grain [[Isa.17.5|Isa 17:5]] (figurative; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסַף‎</span>), [[Job.24.6|Job 24:6]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] see **Hiph\`il**), compare [[Lev.25.5|Lev 25:5]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), v[[Lev.25.11|Lev 25:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרַע‎</span>), so (object omitted) [[2Kgs.19.29|2Kgs 19:29]] = [[Isa.37.30|Isa 37:30]]; [[Mic.6.15|Mic 6:15]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרַע‎</span>), [[Lev.19.9|Lev 19:9]] b [[Lev.23.22|Lev 23:22]] b [[Ruth.2.9|Ruth 2:9]]; [[Eccl.11.4|Eccl 11:4]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרַע‎</span>); object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹצִים‎</span> [[Jer.12.13|Jer 12:13]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרַע‎</span>); ***Participle*** = ***reaper*** [[Amos.9.13|Amos 9:13]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺרֵשׁ‎</span>), [[Jer.9.21|Jer 9:21]] (simile), [[Ps.129.7|Ps 129:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעַמֵּר‎</span>), + [[Isa.17.5|Isa 17:5]] (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצִיד‎</span>, so [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex 13</sup> [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]); plural [[2Kgs.4.18|2Kgs 4:18]]; [[Ruth.2.3|Ruth 2:3]]; [[Ruth.2.4|Ruth 2:4]]; [[Ruth.2.5|Ruth 2:5]]; [[Ruth.2.6|Ruth 2:6]]; [[Ruth.2.7|Ruth 2:7]]; [[Ruth.2.14|Ruth 2:14]] figurative of reaping fruits of righteousness [[Hos.10.12|Hos 10:12]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרַע‎</span>), of evil [[Hos.8.7|Hos 8:7]] (both + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרַע‎</span>), [[Hos.10.13|Hos 10:13]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרָשׁ‎</span>), [[Job.4.8|Job 4:8]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרַשׁ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרַע‎</span>, [[Prov.22.8|Prov 22:8]]; [[Ps.126.5|Ps 126:5]] they that sow (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרַע‎</span>) in tears ***shall reap*** in joy. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יקצירו‎</span> [[Job.24.6|Job 24:6]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (&lt; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְצ֑וֺרוּ‎</span>, see above).
